verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician אֶל־ <WH413> about שֹׁשַׁנִּ֑ים עֵד֖וּת <WH7802> upon Shoshannimeduth לְאָסָ֣ף <WH623> of Asaph מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <WH4210> A Psalm רֹ֘עֵ֤ה <WH7462> O Shepherd יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל ׀ <WH3478> of Israel הַאֲזִ֗ינָה <WH238> Give ear נֹהֵ֣ג <WH5090> thou that leadest כַּצֹּ֣אן <WH6629> like a flock יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> Joseph יֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> thou that dwellest הַכְּרוּבִ֣ים <WH3742> [between] the cherubims הוֹפִֽיעָה׃ <WH3313> shine forth

לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> Before אֶפְרַ֨יִם ׀ <WH669> Ephraim וּבִנְיָ֘מִ֤ן <WH1144> and Benjamin וּמְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <WH4519> and Manasseh עוֹרְרָ֥ה <WH5782> stir up אֶת־ <WH853> גְּבֽוּרָתֶ֑ךָ <WH1369> thy strength וּלְכָ֖ה <WH1980> and come לִישֻׁעָ֣תָה <WH3444> [and] save לָּֽנוּ׃
אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> O God הֲשִׁיבֵ֑נוּ <WH7725> Turn us again וְהָאֵ֥ר <WH215> to shine פָּ֝נֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> and cause thy face וְנִוָּשֵֽׁעָה׃ <WH3467> and we shall be saved

יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> God צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts עַד־ <WH5704> against מָתַ֥י <WH4970> How עָ֝שַׁ֗נְתָּ <WH6225> how long wilt thou be angry בִּתְפִלַּ֥ת <WH8605> against the prayer עַמֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5971> You

הֶ֭אֱכַלְתָּם <WH398> Thou feedest לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> them with the bread דִּמְעָ֑ה <WH1832> of tears וַ֝תַּשְׁקֵ֗מוֹ <WH8248> to drink בִּדְמָע֥וֹת <WH1832> and givest them tears שָׁלִֽישׁ׃ <WH7991> in great measure
תְּשִׂימֵ֣נוּ <WH7760> Thou makest מָ֭דוֹן <WH4066> us a strife לִשְׁכֵנֵ֑ינוּ <WH7934> unto our neighbours וְ֝אֹיְבֵ֗ינוּ <WH341> and our enemies יִלְעֲגוּ־ <WH3932> laugh לָֽמוֹ׃
אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> O God צְבָא֣וֹת <WH6635> of hosts הֲשִׁיבֵ֑נוּ <WH7725> Turn us again וְהָאֵ֥ר <WH215> to shine פָּ֝נֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> and cause thy face וְנִוָּשֵֽׁעָה׃ <WH3467> and we shall be saved

גֶּ֭פֶן <WH1612> a vine מִמִּצְרַ֣יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt תַּסִּ֑יעַ <WH5265> Thou hast brought תְּגָרֵ֥שׁ <WH1644> thou hast cast out גּ֝וֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> the heathen וַתִּטָּעֶֽהָ׃ <WH5193> and planted

פִּנִּ֥יתָ <WH6437> Thou preparedst לְפָנֶ֑יהָ <WH6440> [room] before וַתַּשְׁרֵ֥שׁ <WH8327> root שָׁ֝רָשֶׁ֗יהָ <WH8328> it and didst cause it to take deep וַתְּמַלֵּא־ <WH4390> and it filled אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the land

כָּסּ֣וּ <WH3680> were covered הָרִ֣ים <WH2022> The hills צִלָּ֑הּ <WH6738> with the shadow וַ֝עֲנָפֶ֗יהָ <WH6057> of it and the boughs אַֽרְזֵי־ <WH730> cedars אֵֽל׃ <WH410> thereof [were like] the goodly

תְּשַׁלַּ֣ח <WH7971> She sent out קְצִירֶ֣הָ <WH7105> her boughs עַד־ <WH5704> against יָ֑ם <WH3220> unto the sea וְאֶל־ <WH413> to נָ֝הָ֗ר <WH5104> unto the river יֽוֹנְקוֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH3127> and her branches

לָ֭מָּה <WH4100> Why פָּרַ֣צְתָּ <WH6555> Why hast thou [then] broken down גְדֵרֶ֑יהָ <WH1447> her hedges וְ֝אָר֗וּהָ <WH717> do pluck כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֹ֥בְרֵי <WH5674> so that all they which pass דָֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> by the way

יְכַרְסְמֶ֣נָּֽה <WH3765> doth waste חֲזִ֣יר <WH2386> The boar מִיָּ֑ עַר <WH3293> out of the wood וְזִ֖יז <WH2123> it and the wild beast שָׂדַ֣י <WH7704> of the field יִרְעֶֽנָּה׃ <WH7462> doth devour

אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> we beseech thee O God צְבָאוֹת֮ <WH6635> of hosts שֽׁ֫וּב־ <WH7725> Return נָ֥א <WH4994> now הַבֵּ֣ט <WH5027> look down מִשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> from heaven וּרְאֵ֑ה <WH7200> and behold וּ֝פְקֹ֗ד <WH6485> and visit גֶּ֣פֶן <WH1612> this vine זֹֽאת׃ <WH2063> Even

וְ֭כַנָּה <WH3657> the shoot אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָטְעָ֣ה <WH5193> hath planted יְמִינֶ֑ךָ <WH3225> which thy right hand וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on בֵּ֝֗ן <WH1121> and the branch אִמַּ֥צְתָּה <WH553> [that] thou madest strong לָּֽךְ׃
שְׂרֻפָ֣ה <WH8313> [It is] burned בָאֵ֣שׁ <WH784> with fire כְּסוּחָ֑ה <WH3683> [it is] cut down מִגַּעֲרַ֖ת <WH1606> at the rebuke פָּנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> of thy countenance יֹאבֵֽדוּ׃ <WH6> they perish

תְּֽהִי־ <WH1961> Let יָ֭דְךָ <WH3027> Let thy hand עַל־ <WH5921> be upon אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> be upon the man יְמִינֶ֑ךָ <WH3225> of thy right hand עַל־ <WH5921> upon בֶּן־ <WH1121> upon the son אָ֝דָ֗ם <WH120> of man אִמַּ֥צְתָּ <WH553> [whom] thou madest strong לָּֽךְ׃

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> shall not נָס֥וֹג <WH5472> So will not we go back מִמֶּ֑ךָּ <WH4480> at תְּ֝חַיֵּ֗נוּ <WH2421> from thee quicken וּבְשִׁמְךָ֥ <WH8034> upon thy name נִקְרָֽא׃ <WH7121> us and we will call

יְה֘וָ֤ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> God צְבָא֣וֹת <WH6635> of hosts הֲשִׁיבֵ֑נוּ <WH7725> Turn us again הָאֵ֥ר <WH215> to shine פָּ֝נֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> cause thy face וְנִוָּשֵֽׁעָה׃ <WH3467> and we shall be saved
